entry.title: On OP_RETURN in upcoming 0.9 release
entry.summary: In a conversation between Pieter Wuille and Jeff Garzik, the latter suggested that regular transactions should have the ability to include some metadata. However, Pieter disagreed with this proposal, stating that it contradicts with another suggestion made by Jeff which was about the endorsement of chain data storage. Jeff is a Bitcoin core developer and open source evangelist who works for BitPay Inc.
